      • createCompany

        @RequestMapping(path="CreateCompany",
                method=POST)
public boolean createCompany(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                  @RequestBody
                                                                                                  Company company)
                                                                                           throws MyCouponSystemException
        A function which tries to create a new company in the DB.
        Parameters:
        session - The session of the connected admin.
        company - A company to try to create.
        Returns:
        True if the company was created.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen if there is already a company with the same name.

      • removeCompany

        @RequestMapping(path="RemoveCompany",
                method=POST)
public boolean removeCompany(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                  @RequestBody
                                                                                                  Company company)
                                                                                           throws MyCouponSystemException
        Removes a Company with all of its coupons and all of the linked coupons of that company.
        Parameters:
        session - The session of the connected admin.
        company - A company to try to remove.
        Returns:
        True if the company was removed.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when the received company wasn't in the DB.

      • createCustomer

        @RequestMapping(path="CreateCustomer",
                method=POST)
public boolean createCustomer(javax.servlet.http.HttpSession session,
                                                                                                    @RequestBody
                                                                                                    Customer customer)
                                                                                             throws MyCouponSystemException
        Creates a new customer. cannot create a customer with the same name as an existing one.
        Parameters:
        session - the session of the connected admin.
        customer - A customer to try to create.
        Returns:
        True if the customer was created.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when the new customer name already exists in the DB.

        customer - A customer to try to remove.
        Returns:
        True if the customer was removed.
        Throws:
        MyCouponSystemException - Can happen when the customer to delete does not exist in DB.

      • login

        @RequestMapping(path="/Login/{name}/{password}",
                method=GET)
public boolean login(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                    @PathVariable(value="name")
                                                                                                    java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                    @PathVariable(value="password")
                                                                                                    java.lang.String password)
                                                                                             throws LoginException
        A function to check for login info of the admin
        Specified by:
        login in class ClientController
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the admin.
        password - Password of the admin.
        request - The request from the client.
        Returns:
        True if login was successful.
        Throws:
        LoginException - Can happen when the name and password are not correct.
